channel.title: For children 3 years old on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in For children 3 years old on Game6r

item.title: Cartoon Fruit Puzzle
item.description: A colorful puzzle game for children 3 years old invites you to show maximum care and try to assemble a cute picture with a tiger from scattered pieces for free. Grab the appropriate elements with the cursor and connect them to each other, focusing on the shape and part of the picture depicted on them. It will be easy for children 3 years old to play our virtual puzzles, thanks to a small hint.
